xml:
<xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
  <block type="board" id="y({JzT1(dep4|b6Ad@l1" x="312" y="162">
    <field name="type_">usb</field>
    <statement name="callbacks_">
      <block type="controls_loop_forever" id="kb0j,bAQa#x^TN63UjIe">
        <field name="async">FALSE</field>
        <statement name="do_">
          <block type="bit_button_event" id="+-|fxv7lhH@]}nR2]GxM">
            <field name="var_">_bit_btnA_</field>
            <field name="event_">pressed</field>
            <statement name="do_">
              <block type="radio_channel_set" id="[xIs*vX%e?W{K1f+r@fm">
                <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">發送廣播訊息後，才會繼續執行下方程式</comment>
                <value name="name_">
                  <block type="text" id="AqO1Ja:}4C+qq,~!AFN4">
                    <field name="TEXT">1</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
                <value name="msg_">
                  <block type="text" id="g_(yi{1YXH7Wm.,xMKvE">
                    <field name="TEXT">Marco</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
              </block>
            </statement>
            <next>
              <block type="radio_channel_get" id="*6cZnZhvmEkarcnQcFWu">
                <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">獨立使用，不需放在迴圈積木內，就能持續偵測頻道。</comment>
                <value name="name_">
                  <block type="text" id="x|;SUa[#4Y7pXZWXPKR=">
                    <field name="TEXT">1</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
                <statement name="do_">
                  <block type="bit_matrix_string_once" id="DNLgu3Pkz8nVd:dhXxw2">
                    <field name="type_">1</field>
                    <field name="speed_">2</field>
                    <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">若選擇一次，在跑馬燈結束後才會繼續執行下方程式</comment>
                    <value name="str_">
                      <block type="radio_channel_value" id="xrvS)vYY#v~A*6@4j`KL"></block>
                    </value>
                    <value name="color_">
                      <block type="colour_picker" id="z%30EqPG!00=[o@41!WN">
                        <field name="COLOUR">#ff0000</field>
                      </block>
                    </value>
                    <next>
                      <block type="buzzer_play_music" id="j3!2E~l|cc2@(`0vbM6t">
                        <field name="music_">m1</field>
                      </block>
                    </next>
                  </block>
                </statement>
                <next>
                  <block type="bit_button_event" id="b1KAu?Tpvl?H8t^~ezp}">
                    <field name="var_">_bit_btnB_</field>
                    <field name="event_">pressed</field>
                    <statement name="do_">
                      <block type="bit_matrix_off" id="F}ftdvreW_k`tfg?X8i8"></block>
                    </statement>
                    <next>
                      <block type="delay" id="45N~pRb[[SYAEFZ)pKm~">
                        <value name="secs_">
                          <block type="math_number" id="J`[6j_vkZ(9?80k/15d)">
                            <field name="NUM">2</field>
                          </block>
                        </value>
                      </block>
                    </next>
                  </block>
                </next>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </statement>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
</xml>
